title: Teenage pregnancy
creator_credit: Hector Lemieux, Joe Hayward, Moreland-Latchford Productions and Sterling Educational Films
brief_description: Shows the reaction of a family when one of the daughters reveals that she is pregnant. Presents the decisions to be made concerning both the mother-to-be and the coming child, ignoring the responsibility of the father and concentrating on the girl’s problem.
creator_credit_for_label: Hector Lemieux, Joe Hayward, Moreland-Latchford Productions and Sterling Educational Films
